Package it.polimi.ingsw.messages.actions

Interface Action

All Superinterfaces:
Message, java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
BuyDevCard, BuyResources, DiscardLeadCard, MoveResources, PlayLeadCard, StartProduction
public interface Action
extends Message
Interface Action is a Message sent from a client to server that represents a generic action performed by the player.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void checkAction​(Player player)
    Checks if the action can be performed.
    boolean doAction​(Player player)
    Performs the action chosen by the player.
    UserAction getType()
    Returns the type of the action performed by the player.

  • Method Details

    • doAction

      boolean doAction​(Player player)
      Performs the action chosen by the player. Safety is guaranteed if this method is called after checkAction(Player), if the latter does not throw an exception.
      Parameters:
      player - the player performing the action
      Returns:
      true if the action is exclusive, false otherwise

    • getType

      UserAction getType()
      Returns the type of the action performed by the player.
      Returns:
      the type of the action

    • checkAction

      void checkAction​(Player player) throws WrongActionException
      Checks if the action can be performed.
      Parameters:
      player - the player who wants to perform the action
      Throws:
      WrongActionException - if one of the game rules is broken
